message: Snap.
Chihiro: "You... you can look all you want."
Yusaku: "...Stay strong just like that."
Chihiro: "Ugh...ugh..."
Yusaku: "If you behave obscenely, your mother will scold you."
Chihiro: "You... you planned to do this from the start."
Yusaku: "Your Uncle likes to make you, who dislikes it, do it."
Chihiro: "Then I definitely won't close my legs."
Yusaku: "Then your Uncle will..."
Jiggle.
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "..."
Good.
She lifted it up before I did.
Yusaku: "...Why are you taking away your Uncle's pleasure?"
Chihiro: "Because... I want to get back at you."
Yusaku: "Who's the naughty child peeping through the hole in the screen door?"
Chihiro: "If there was such a noise, anyone would peek."
Yusaku: "I never thought Chihiro would make such an excuse..."
Chihiro: "Just tell me the color of my underwear already."
Yusaku: "...White."
Chihiro: "You're satisfied now, right, Uncle?"
Yusaku: "I might be more satisfied if I could touch..."
Chihiro: "If you touch me, I'll report you to the police."
Yusaku: "Chihiro, you're too timid to do such a thing."
Chihiro: "No, not just the police. I'll tell Auntie too. I'll ruin the life of the uncle who tormented me."
Yusaku: "...What's fun about troubling your uncle so much?"
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Yusaku: "Please, keep it a secret, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "Huh... uh..."
Yusaku: "...I'm sorry, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "No, I won't forgive you. It's just words anyway."
Yusaku: "I see, in that case..."
(The sound of a door opening.)
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Yusaku: "If you won't forgive me, I have no choice but to do this."
Chihiro: "Do whatever you want."
Yusaku: "Thanks to you dressing so lewdly, look at me..."
(He touches himself.)
Chihiro: "Self-pleasuring is the worst. You're not regretful at all, Uncle."
Yusaku: "It's not just self-pleasure, Chihiro."
(Sound of a camera shutter.)
Chihiro: "!!?"
Yusaku: "I'm going to commemorate your beautiful appearance. Don't tell anyone about what I did."
Chihiro: "That... that's my... phone...?"
Yusaku: "Say cheese."
Chihiro: "No, don't take pictures!"
(Sound of a camera falling.)
Chihiro: "Ah..."
Yusaku: "Ouch..."
Chihiro: "I'm... I'm sorry..."
Yusaku: "Why are you apologizing?"
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Keep pressing the shutter."
Chihiro: "Huh?"
Yusaku: "Now it's your turn to disgrace your uncle."
Chihiro: "But..."
(He continues to touch himself.)
Yusaku: "Ugh..."
Chihiro: "Huh..."
Yusaku: "Haah... haah... haah... uh..."
Chihiro: "Ah... uh..."
Yusaku: "See, it's not often you see such a disgraceful sight."
Chihiro: "Doing something like that is stupid."
(Shutter sound.)
Yusaku: "...Yes, it is."
Chihiro: "Aren't you embarrassed, being an adult?"
(Shutter sound.)
Chihiro: "You're all alone, making your penis hard, and furiously stroking it all by yourself..."
Click.
Yusaku: "Haah... Haah... Uuh... Haah..."
Chihiro: "What a pitiful and pathetic sight, Uncle."
Yusaku: "...Right?"
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "How old was Uncle again?"
Chihiro: "Probably a bit older than you..."
Yusaku: "It's pretty disgraceful for someone his age, isn't it?"
Chihiro: "Yes, it's disgraceful."
Yusaku: "So the man you were afraid of is just this level of good-for-nothing."
Chihiro: "...That might be the case."
Yusaku: "He's just a coward who can't handle a grown woman."
Stroking noises.
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Am I wrong?"
Chihiro: "I... I think he is a coward."
Yusaku: "You've stopped taking pictures."
Chihiro: "Ah..."
Click.
Chihiro: "Uncle, the coward."
Click.
Chihiro: "Doing such things to someone who can't fight back, Uncle is a cowardly, low, good-for-nothing..."
Yusaku: "...You're right, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Uncle is a piece of trash."
Chihiro: "It's too late to say something like that now."
Click.
Chihiro: "Taking advantage of my weakness..."
Click.
Chihiro: "Taking so many strange photos..."
Click.
Chihiro: "And using them to threaten me is too cruel."
Click.
Chihiro: "Tell me why you targeted me."
Yusaku: "Because I thought you'd do anything I told you to."
Chihiro: "Even for an adult like me?"
Yusaku: "Uncle only knew the old Chihiro."
Chihiro: "I'm asking the current chief."
Click.
Chihiro: "Uncle, who is like a demon, raped me in front of my husband."
Yusaku: "Huh..."
Chihiro: "If you don't answer, I'll..."
Yusaku: "What will you do?"
Chihiro: "I'll post the embarrassing photos on the bulletin board of the apartment building. I'll make a big poster and go to the pool again, and post it in the toilet."
Yusaku: "...Please don't do that."
Chihiro: "Then tell me."
Yusaku: "The reason I targeted you was because you were beautiful."
Chihiro: "Don't joke with me."
Yusaku: "Then, it was because your smile was lovely."
Click.
Chihiro: "Uncle, the liar."
Yusaku: "I could say it's because your breasts are large."
Chihiro: "If that was the case, you could have just touched them. But you've been very cruel to me."
Yusaku: "I like seeing you troubled, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "You thought if you bullied me, I'd comply obediently."
Yusaku: "Exactly."
Chihiro: "But if you were only after my body, you could have taken it by force."
Yusaku: "Huh?"
Chihiro: "Uncle, you deliberately took the long way around."
Yusaku: "Well, I'm a coward too, aren't I?"
Chihiro: "That's a lie too."
Yusaku: "Why?"
Chihiro: "You're not trembling at all."
Yusaku: "I'm just putting on a brave face because I'm timid."
Stroking noises.
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Yusaku: "I've never seen a woman walk such a tightrope as you."
Chihiro: "Why did you choose me to bully?"
Yusaku: "I don't know..."
Chihiro: "What I want to know is why."
Yusaku: "Does it really matter?"
Chihiro: "It does."
Yusaku: "What answer would satisfy you?"
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Do you want praise? Or do you want to be criticized?"
Chihiro: "I don't particularly..."
Yusaku: "Uncle's objective was only your body, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Yusaku: "Which means, there's no need to harbor any feelings other than contempt."
Chihiro: "That's why I can't accept it."
Yusaku: "The conversation is going off the rails. What did you come here for?"
Chihiro: "It's not off topic because you're my Uncle. If I clearly understand the reason, I'm sure the strange fear will disappear."
Yusaku: "You're wrong."
Chihiro: "I know myself better than anyone else."
Yusaku: "More than me?"
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "What you need is the feeling of forgiving Uncle. Realize he's a man not even worth hating by witnessing his disgrace."
Yusaku: "That way, the feelings of self-blame will naturally disappear. Of course, if you could insult Uncle enough to feel pity for him, that is."
Chihiro: "I can't do it anymore."
Yusaku: "Don't give up so easily."
Chihiro: "I can't even tell who I'm blaming with this."
Yusaku: "This is even better."
Stroking noises.
Chihiro: "Ah..."
Yusaku: "You should blame both Uncle and me."
Chihiro: "You are not my trauma."
Yusaku: "Might as well get it all over with."
Chihiro: "That was your aim from the beginning."
Yusaku: "It's cleaner when both are gone."
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Yusaku: "Come on, start insulting."
Stroking noise.
Yusaku: "I look pathetic no matter how you look at it, right?"
Chihiro: "Yes, pathetic and the worst."
Yusaku: "Indeed."
Stroking noises.
Chihiro: "Doing it yourself doesn't suit you."
Yusaku: "A lonely middle-aged man is just like this."
Chihiro: "Then you should get married."
Yusaku: "Uncle is already married."
Chihiro: "I was talking about you, Chief, not Uncle."
Yusaku: "No one would marry a man like me."
Chihiro: "That's because you don't want to get married..."
Yusaku: "Who would fall for a guy who exploits weaknesses and threatens people?"
Chihiro: "There must be some good points about you."
Yusaku: "No, there aren't."
Chihiro: "You can't know that for sure."
Yusaku: "This hasn't sounded like an insult for a while."
Chihiro: "But..."
Yusaku: "Try saying, 'You're just like trash to me'."
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Yusaku: "Say it."
Chihiro: "You're just like trash to me."
Yusaku: "You're less significant to me than air."
Chihiro: "You're less significant to me than air."
Yusaku: "A man not worth living."
Chihiro: "I can't say such a terrible thing."
Yusaku: "There's no need to be considerate to trash."
Stroking noises.
Chihiro: "Hic..."
Yusaku: "I apologize for being born into this world."
Chihiro: "You belittle yourself too much, Chief."
Yusaku: "If I didn't exist, my wife could have lived normally."
Chihiro: "That's because I had a weakness too..."
Yusaku: "You didn't do anything wrong."
Chihiro: "At least I had a chance to ask someone for help."
Yusaku: "I'm the one who made that impossible. I took pictures and silenced you, just like Uncle..."
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Including on behalf of Uncle, I'll apologize. In the most pathetic way fitting for a scumbag, you see..."
Stroking noises, then a tight squeeze.
Yusaku: "I'm about to ejaculate soon, so take a picture of that moment with my face in it."
Chihiro: "No, no."
Yusaku: "It'll be a shame that'll last for generations for a man."
Chihiro: "Please, stop it already."
Yusaku: "Huff...haa...haa..."
Chihiro: "You shouldn't do such things to yourself."
Yusaku: "It's fine for a scumbag like Uncle."
Squeeze.
Chihiro: "I'm talking about you, not Uncle."
Yusaku: "...Let go of it."
Chihiro: "If you promise to stop stroking."
Yusaku: "At the very least, your anxiety towards me will disappear. If you have a picture of me ejaculating, I definitely won't be able to do anything."
Chihiro: "We, we only need to deal with Uncle this time."
Yusaku: "So, have you come to forgive Uncle?"
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Then I have to expose an even more shameful and pathetic sight."
Chihiro: "Anyway, please consider things separately. It's unfair to lump everything together."
Yusaku: "That's why I said we might as well."
Chihiro: "I can handle things that have happened since becoming an adult myself."
Yusaku: "How?"
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Squeeze.
Yusaku: "...You're squeezing too hard."
Chihiro: "Because you, Chief, are being unfair..."
Yusaku: "...In what way?"
Chihiro: "You have no right to settle things. You're trying to make me forget everything by mixing up the issue with Uncle."
Yusaku: "You're the one who mixed them up first."
Chihiro: "You also said it was convenient, Chief."
Yusaku: "So we're both in agreement, then."
Chihiro: "I'm not in agreement at all."
Squeeze.
Yusaku: "Ouch..."
Chihiro: "You deserve it."
Yusaku: "What on earth do you want?"
Chihiro: "Tell me why you chose me."
Yusaku: "Why are you so fixated on that?"
Chihiro: "You could answer me, couldn't you?"
Yusaku: "...You're a persistent woman."
Squeeze.
Yusaku: "Enough already."
Chihiro: "I'll keep applying pressure if you don't tell me."
Yusaku: "If you don't want it all mixed up, just ask about Uncle."
Chihiro: "I don't care about Uncle anymore."
A tight squeeze.
Yusaku: "Ouch, hey, that hurts."
Chihiro: "Tell me why you chose me."
Yusaku: "Why do you ask about something you're trying to forget?"
Chihiro: "I, I won't forget. I'll remember it, absolutely."
Yusaku: "...I don't want to go back to who I was before."
Chihiro: "I want to go back. But I don't want to be made to forget because of your selfish reasons."
Yusaku: "What does that even mean?"
Chihiro: "That's why I absolutely..."
Yusaku: "You will forget."
Chihiro: "I, I won't forget."
Yusaku: "...You'll forget when the treatment is over."
Chihiro: "Why, why would you say something like that?"
Yusaku: "Because I want to put an end to this."
Chihiro: "Ugh..."
Yusaku: "It's not something to cry about, you should be happy."
Chihiro: "But, but..."
Yusaku: "It seems like the only adult parts about you are your breasts and pussy. You start crying at the drop of a hat."
Chihiro: "You, you're terrible..."
Yusaku: "...Crybaby."
Chihiro: "If you want me to forget so badly, I'll forget after I get my revenge."
Yusaku: "Go ahead."
Chihiro: "I'll forget on my own terms, not because of you."
Yusaku: "So, go ahead."
Chihiro: "I'll take a lot of embarrassing photos of you... I'll make you go shopping with your pants off... I'll violate you in front of someone important to you."
From then on...
I cried a lot, even to the point of surprising myself.
I lost control of my emotions again.
I started sobbing without any care.
Why?
Who knows?
My pride was more shattered than when I was violated.
I was unbearably frustrated by his one-sided attitude.
Even so, I didn't let go of his penis.
Before I knew it, I was holding it tightly with both hands.
This act, not by reason but by instinct, was the most repulsive.
To be jerked off and made to ejaculate at his whim.
So I wrapped my hands around his...
I'm desperately holding it still so it wouldn't move.
I don't remember much from there.
Perhaps he provoked me with cruel words.
Or maybe, under the pretext of revenge, I did something myself.
My mind was spinning.
Tears were falling.
His penis was hard.
I felt like I was going crazy.
In fact, I was already crazy.
Eventually, I didn't know what had become of what.
In the situation where I was pretending to be confident, I...
